turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I'm so frustrated! I just got another denial from the insurance company. Can you help me figure out why this claim was denied? The reference number is 789012345.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I can certainly try. Please give me a moment to access the details for reference number 789012345. Okay, I've pulled up the claim. The denial reason appears to be 'Missing Prior Authorization'.  It looks like the service required pre-approval that wasn't obtained.  Do you want more details about the specific service and what steps are needed?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Yes, please! I'm sure I had the prior authorization. I called the insurance company before the appointment and they said it was approved. Is there any way to verify if the doctor submitted the required paperwork for the pre-authorization correctly? If not, how can I get this resolved quickly?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: That's a great question. Unfortunately, I do not have direct access to the paperwork submitted by your doctor's office. I would recommend checking with your doctor's office, and asking them to verify whether they have the PA approval. They can often resubmit the claim, or send supporting documentation. You can also contact the insurance company directly to see if they have a record of the prior authorization. The number to call should be on your insurance card. Resolving this quickly will likely depend on the responsiveness of the doctor's office and the insurance company. Is there anything else I can help you with?
